description: The begonia 'Gryphon' is a truly amazing plant. It has a unique feathery, rose-like foliage with purple, cream and green coloration. Its deep pink, double flowers bloom from summer to fall, their petals kissed with yellow stamens for maximum impact. This Begonia can tolerate full shade and make an ideal companion for hostas and ferns. It is exceptionally hardy, being drought and humidity tolerant, and once established, itâ€™s mostly carefree. A real show-stopper in the garden, Begonia 'Gryphon' is sure to attract plenty of attention and appreciation.
